select t.item_id, t.max_discount_amount, r.title, r.cover_url, r.min_price, r.sale_num, if(now() >= t.advance_time, 1, 0) as onSale from limit_purchase_item t inner join item r on t.item_id = r.id where r.state = 1 and r.deleted = false and t.deleted = false and now() between t.advance_time and t.end_time and r.min_price > 0
and r.title like concat('%', #{param.queryName, typeHandler=com.eghm.handler.mysql.LikeTypeHandler} ,'%')
order by r.min_price, r.recommend desc
order by r.total_num desc, r.recommend desc
order by r.score desc, r.recommend desc
order by t.max_discount_amount desc, r.recommend desc
order by r.recommend desc, t.id desc
select t.sku_value, t.item_id, r.title, r.cover_url from limit_purchase_item t left join item r on t.item_id = r.id where t.deleted = false and r.deleted = false and t.limit_purchase_id = #{limitId}
